headlines: Ubisoft shuts down support studio amidst industry-wide layoffs
Beyond Good & Evil 2 development continues amidst Ubisoft's staff cuts
Engadget reports on Ubisoft's recent layoffs and voluntary buyouts
tts_script: Ubisoft is facing more layoffs, with the shutdown of a support studio and ongoing development of Beyond Good & Evil 2 amidst industry-wide cuts. Learn more about this story on Engadget.

original_raw_news.original_title: Beyond Good & Evil 2 is somehow still under development
original_raw_news.original_summary: With the gaming industry's recent rash of layoffs,
